description.value: As a maneuver, you can choose a magewright signature or heroic ability that you would be able to learn if you were one level higher or lower. Provided you meet the abilityâ€™s other prerequisites and can spend any required Heroic Resources, you can use this ability once this encounter, and it costs 1d3 fewer wonder to use. Once you use this feature, you cannot do so again until you gain at least 1 victory, or finish a respite.
